items.title: Germany's Merz promises to do 'whatever it takes' on defence
items.description: Germany's likely chancellor-to-be announces a political deal to raise hundreds of billions of euros in extra spending.

items.title: Gaza food aid scarce after Israel halts entry
items.description: The UN said at least 80 community kitchens may run out of stock, and remaining food rations will soon run dry.

items.title: Six takeaways from Trump's big speech
items.description: The president declares "America is back" as he spars with Democrats and gives a shout-out to Elon Musk.

items.title: Fact-checking Trump's address to Congress
items.description: BBC Verify has looked into several claims made by Trump during his speech to Congress.

items.title: Pope well-rested after respiratory failure, Vatican says
items.description: The Vatican said Pope Francis spent the night on "non-invasive mechanical ventilation".
